channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A brief encounter, two attacks and then a break in investigations into the Brown and MIT shootings
item.description: Investigators are still trying to figure out much of what Claudio Neves Valente was doing in New England in the weeks before they say he opened fire in a Brown University lecture hall and later killed a Massachusetts Institute of Technology professor.

item.title: Brown University attack suspect died 2 days before his body was found, autopsy finds
Suspect in Brown University shooting and MIT professorâ€™s killing was once a physics student
